Node.definition: = man; ◄ son of Jesse (יִשַׁי) ► king of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= referent to the speaker or writer in a discourse
= process by which humans or deities follow a certain pattern of behavior, ◄ which is described as their journey through life
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= state in which humans have confidence in someone or something else and show that by their actions; ≈ usually regarded as negative when the object is human, always positive when the object is YHWH

= action by which humans or deities examine the character of other humans or deities by having them engage in a certain activity, ◄ as a goldsmith tests the quality of a precious metal by smelting it in the fire
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

Node.gloss: to test|to put to the test
Node.definition: = action by which humans or deities make an effort to obtain information about (other) humans by observing them while they engage in a certain activity
= action by which humans or deities examine the character of humans by having them engage in a certain activity, ◄ as a goldsmith tests the quality of a precious metal by smelting it in the fire
literally: kidney; hence: = seat of a person's emotions and devotion to God, created by God, and hidden to everyone but God himself
literally: heart; hence: = the seat of knowledge, human reasoning, planning, intelligence, skill, affection and hatred, desire and satisfaction, humility and pride, courage and fear, joy and grief

= state in which humans or deities are committed towards fulfilling their obligations and show that by their actions; these obligations include responsibilities towards kinspeople, spouses, friends, covenant partners, and people to whom one is indebted as a result of favors received

= one of two parts of the body of humans and animals that is used to see things, after which the observed information is stored and processed in the mind; sparkling when the body is healthy and strong, but dim when weak or sick; the eyes also play a significant role in determining whether a person is considered beautiful or not; eyes can reflect both an attitude of compassion and a sentiment of malice; ≈ high eyes are associated with pride, whereas lowly eyes are connected with humility; a good eye is associated with generosity, whereas an evil eye denotes stinginess; winking the eye is associated with underhanded practices
= process by which humans or deities follow a certain pattern of behavior, ◄ which is described as their journey through life
= state in which humans and deities are considered worthy of trust, because they are truthful and committed, with an unwavering disposition, which is reflected in their words and actions
= action by which humans assume a sitting position in a certain location and remain in that position for some time; ≈ sometimes associated with a certain status, role, or common activity
= human beings, regardless of sex and age
= state in which humans are not committed towards fulfilling their obligations and show that by their actions
= state in which humans or deities experience hostility towards a person, an object, or a practice

Node.gloss: to act wickedly|to do wickedness|to do evil
Node.definition: = action by which humans behave in an evil or harmful way
= action by which humans assume a sitting position in a certain location and remain in that position for some time; ≈ sometimes associated with a certain status, role, or common activity

Node.gloss: to take a bath|to bathe|to wash
Node.definition: = causative action by which humans or animals wash (part of) their own body or someone else's body or another object, usually with water, ► in order to remove any dirt; ≈ the resulting cleanness often symbolizes ritual cleanness, innocence, or even holiness
= state in which someone or something is without or free from guilt
literally: to wash one's palms in innocence; hence: = to live a life of integrity doing one's utmost to keep from sin
= action by which humans move in a full or partial circle

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= construction with a flat top, ◄ originally made out of stones that were not cut and shaped with tools, later also out of metal; ► used for burning sacrifices
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
literally: confession; hence: = action by which humans openly express recognition of what someone else has done or achieved

Node.gloss: to tell|to recount|to proclaim: to declare
Node.definition: = action by which humans communicate verbally to others about an event or situation, with focus on the contents rather than on the speech act
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= state in which humans or deities experience a feeling of affection for a person, an object, or a practice

= construction surrounded by walls and covered with a roof; ◄ normally made of stones, wood, or clay; ► to be used as living quarters, for storage, as a prison, as a sanctuary, etc.; sometimes used to denote a smaller part of a large construction
= location where a family or household lives, or where a deity is said to reside
= a manifestation of God, sometimes visible, either in a cloud, or looking like fire, capable of speech

Node.gloss: to take away|to destroy|to sweep away
Node.definition: = action by which someone removes another person from existence; ◄ by (a usually unnatural) death, aggression, hardship, disaster, destruction, or direct divine intervention; ► often as punishment
= pattern of actions by which humans commit specified or implied offenses, ► resulting in a state of guilt which may require atonement, restitution, and retribution

literally: throat, as the part of the body that contains the passage ways for blood, air, and food; hence: = the life principle that animates both humans and animals, turns them into breathing living beings, and functions as the center of their personality, mind, physical and non physical desires, courage, emotions, and affections; it is believed to reside in the blood
= causative action by which humans kill other humans in a violent way, usually involving the shedding of blood, which brings guilt upon the people committing these acts

= the state of being alive and well; ◄ because of the presence of air to breathe and food to eat; ≈ life is regarded as more than a mere physical condition; in many cases it includes health, strength, and some degree of prosperity
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
literally: (someone's) hand; = state in which humans bear the responsibility for a certain situation
literally: plan; hence: = a state of moral and ethical corruption, starting with evil plans and resulting in depraved practices, ≈ regarded as foolishness
= the side of the human body which is to the south when facing the direction of the rising sun
= state or process in which a certain location, container, or surface is filled or covered with so many objects that little or no space is left
= an object, usually of some value, given to a person; ► can be given without any expectation of exchange or often with the purpose to influence or persuade another person
= referent to the speaker or writer in a discourse
= process by which humans or deities follow a certain pattern of behavior, ◄ which is described as their journey through life

Node.gloss: to be kindly disposed|to be generous|to be merciful|to be gracious|to pity
Node.definition: = state in which humans or deities are favorably disposed to (other) humans, and act accordingly
literally: foot, here used metonymically to denote the entire person or animal owning it; hence: = a human being or animal with focus on the activities for which they use their feet
= an area of fairly level, high ground; ≈ sometimes associated with a lack of obstacles, both literally and figuratively
= relatively large group of people ► come together for a specific purpose

Node.gloss: to bless|to praise|to greet|to congratulate|to commend
Node.definition: = causative action by which deities grant a special favor to humans, objects, or events, or by which humans invoke a deity to do the same
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
